name: Flag Castle
description: A capture the flag game set in a castle courtyard, with viewers cheering on from the walls lining the courtyard
rules: Capture the flag. No fighting. First player to bring the flag to the base wins. Players move up to 2 spaces, if running, but may trip or be vulnerable when doing so. Players may only grab the flag or place it on the base from one space away.

features.name: flag
features.description: the flag the players are seeking to capture
